page.title: 04RELIGION The Life of a Vicar
page.content: The vicar has been a priest for 31 years and he gets up at 7 o clock every morning.After saying morning prayers he goes to the hospital where he is the chaplin.The Vicar spends most of his time in the hospital visiting the sick and talking and helping the patients and their relations. He spends most of his day in their homes. He also has other jobs to do in the church taking weddings and funerals . He has more funerals than weddings and he also has a few chrisinings. When he has finished his work he likes to relax by listening to music and spending some time with his wife and family. The vicer could not do his work without his car because he has to travel a lot. He lives in the vicarage next to the church and says he likes his job very much.
